body:
The Taskcluster failure here is unrelated; it looks like there was some glitch pulling the commit from GitHub. It should go away on future runs.

To test actually running recipes on the add-on, you'll need to make sure to have Autograph set up to sign recipes. The easiest way to do this is with docker-compose the `compose` directory.
body_text:
The Taskcluster failure here is unrelated; it looks like there was some glitch pulling the commit from GitHub. It should go away on future runs.
To test actually running recipes on the add-on, you'll need to make sure to have Autograph set up to sign recipes. The easiest way to do this is with docker-compose the compose directory.
body_html:
The Taskcluster failure here is unrelated; it looks like there was some glitch pulling the commit from GitHub. It should go away on future runs.

To test actually running recipes on the add-on, you'll need to make sure to have Autograph set up to sign recipes. The easiest way to do this is with docker-compose the compose directory.
